EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Half Elven Versatile Nature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: As a Half-Elf you can choose which heritage you take after, giving you the choice of Human or Elven Core Abilities as you progress through the tree. Your Point Blank Shot and Ranged Sneak Attack range is increased by 2 meters for every Elven Core Ability you select.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Elven Dexterity / Human Adaptability
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select an ability score increase, choosing whether to be more elven or human. Your selection here will affect your selection at level 11.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Elven Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: Human Adaptability: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: Human Adaptability: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: Human Adaptability: +1 Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: Human Adaptability: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: Human Adaptability: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: Human Adaptability: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Elven Accuracy / Human versatility
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a racial ability, and whether to be more elven or human. Your selection here will affect your selection at level 16.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Elven Accuracy
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain +2% to hit with all attacks

EnhancementSelection.Name: Attack Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Active to gain a +6 Action Boost bonus to hit for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Damage Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +20% Action Boost to weapon damage for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Defense Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +10 Action Boost to Armor Class and Physical Resistance Rating for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Saves Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +4 Action Boost to all Saving Throws for 20 seconds. While under this effect you do not automatically fail Saving Throws on a roll of a Natural 1.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Skill Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +4 Action Boost to all skills for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spell Power Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +20 Action Boost to Universal Spell Power for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Elven Dexterity / Human Adaptability
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose an ability score. Your elven or human decisions at level 4 will restrict this choice. (As if you were an Elf or an Human)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Elven Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: Human Adaptability: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: Human Adaptability: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: Human Adaptability: +1 Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: Human Adaptability: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: Human Adaptability: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: Human Adaptability: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Elven Accuracy / Human versatility
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a racial ability. Your elven or human decisions at level 7 will restrict this choice. (As if you were an Elf or an Human)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Elven Accuracy
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain +2% to hit with all attacks

EnhancementSelection.Name: Attack Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Active to gain a +6 Action Boost bonus to hit for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Damage Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +20% Action Boost to weapon damage for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Defense Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +10 Action Boost to Armor Class and Physical Resistance Rating for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Saves Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +4 Action Boost to all Saving Throws for 20 seconds. While under this effect you do not automatically fail Saving Throws on a roll of a Natural 1.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Skill Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +4 Action Boost to all skills for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spell Power Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +20 Action Boost to Universal Spell Power for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Lyrandar Dragonmark Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 dragonmark uses per day, +1/+2/+3 Balance.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Diplomatic Immunity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: Reduce physical damage you take by 25% for 15 seconds or until you attack. Until you rest you have -2 Diplomacy (stacks up to 100 times). On a shared cooldown with Half-Elven Social Graces, and your total Diplomacy score must be positive to use this ability. (Cooldown: 1 minute).

EnhancementSelection.Name: Athletic
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1/+2/+3 Balance, Jump, Swim, and Tumble.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Awareness
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1/+2/+3 Listen, Search, and Spot.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Focused
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1/+2/+3 Concentration and Intimidate.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Negotiator
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1/+2/+3 Bluff, Diplomacy, Haggle and Perform.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Nimble Fingers
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1/+2/+3 Disable Device and Open Lock.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Self Sufficient
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1/+2/+3 Heal and Repair.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Stealthy
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1/+2/+3 Hide and Move Silently.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Improved Dilettante I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Improves your Dilettante feat.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Artificer
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your knowledge of magical items has improved, and now extends to potions. For item purposes you are now treated as a second level Artificer (or your character level, whichever is lower). +30 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Barbarian
EnhancementSelection.Description: You become more resilient and gain +10 Hit Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Bard
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a third level Bard (or your total character level, whichever is lower). +30 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Cleric
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a third level Cleric (or your total character level, whichever is lower). +30 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Druid
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a third level Druid (or your total character level, whichever is lower). +30 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Favored Soul
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a third level Favored Soul (or your total character level, whichever is lower). +30 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Fighter
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your skill with arms is improved and you gain +1 to hit and +1 weapon damage.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Monk
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your defensive skills have improved, and at level 2 or higher you are able to add up to 3 points of your Wisdom bonus to your armor class.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Paladin
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Lesser Divine Grace has improved and at level 2 or higher you may add up to 3 points of your charisma bonus to your saves. For item use purposes you are now treated as a second level Paladin (or your total character level, whichever is lower)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Ranger
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Lesser Bow Strength has improved and at level 2 or higher are able to add up to 4 points of your strength bonus to attacks with bows. For item use purposes you are now treated as a second level Ranger (or your total character level, whichever is lower)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Rogue
EnhancementSelection.Description: You practice stealthy attacks and gain +2 to hit with Sneak Attacks

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Sorcerer
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a third level Sorcerer (or your total character level, whichever is lower.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Warlock
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a third level Warlock (or your total character level, whichever is lower). +30 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Wizard
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a third level Wizard (or your total character level, whichever is lower). +30 Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Arcane Fluidity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your arcane spell failure chance while wearing armor is decreased by 5%/10%/15%. (This has no effect on arcane spell failure from shields.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Lesser Dragonmark of Storm
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Lesser Dragonmark Spell: Electric Loop

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Improved Recovery I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +20 Positive Healing Amplification

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Dilettante Special Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain abilities from your Dilettante Class Enhancements

EnhancementSelection.Name: Armor Mastery
EnhancementSelection.Description: +2 Armor Class and +2 Maximum Dexterity Bonus when wearing Armor. This enhancement cannot be taken if you possess the Armor Mastery enhancement from the Stalwart Defender tree

EnhancementSelection.Name: Conjure Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to create a stack of returning +1 arrows. These arrows are destroyed when you log out. This enhancement cannot be taken if you possess the Conjure Arrows enhancement from the Arcane Archer tree.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Damage Reduction I
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Barbarian damage reduction is increased by 1. This enhancement cannot be taken if you possess the Resistance enhancement from Occult Slayer tree.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Recovery I
EnhancementSelection.Description: +10% Positive Energy Healing. This enhancement cannot be taken if you possess the Bastion of Purity enhancement from the Shintao Monk tree.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Spellcasting I
EnhancementSelection.Description: +5 Universal Spellpower

EnhancementSelection.Name: Lesser Divine Health
EnhancementSelection.Description: You are immune to Natural diseases, and gain +4 to saving throws against Magical disease and do not automatically fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Sly Flourish
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Attack: Deals +1[W] damage with +1 critical threat range, and reduces your threat with nearby enemies by 100. On Sneak Attack: Intelligent target also gains a -1 penalty to Balance, Reflex, and Will saves for 20 seconds. (Stack 5 times.) This enhancement cannot be taken if you possess the Sly Flourish enhancement from the Thief-Acrobat tree. (Cooldown: 12 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Improved Dilettante II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Improves your Dilettante feat.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Artificer
EnhancementSelection.Description: knowledge of magical items has improved, and now extends to wands. For item purposes you are now treated as a third level Artificer (or your total character level, whichever is lower.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Barbarian
EnhancementSelection.Description: You become more resilient and gain +5 hp.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Bard
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a sixth level Bard (or your total character level, whichever is lower.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Cleric
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a sixth level Cleric (or your total character level, whichever is lower.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Druid
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a sixth level Druid (or your total character level, whichever is lower.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Favored Soul
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a sixth level Favored Soul (or your total character level, whichever is lower.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Fighter
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your skill with arms is improved and you gain +1 weapon damage.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Monk
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your defensive skills have improved, and at level 3 or higher you are able to add up to 4 points of your Wisdom bonus to your armor class.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Paladin
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Lesser Divine Grace has improved and at level 3 or higher you may add up to 4 points of your charisma bonus to your saves. For item use purposes you are now treated as a third level Paladin (or your total character level, whichever is lower)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Ranger
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Lesser Bow Strength has improved and at level 3 or higher are able to add up to 4 points of your strength bonus to attacks with bows. For item use purposes you are now treated as a third level Ranger (or your total character level, whichever is lower)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Rogue
EnhancementSelection.Description: You practice stealthy attacks and gain +1d6 Sneak Attack

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Sorcerer
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a sixth level Sorcerer (or your total character level, whichever is lower.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Warlock
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a sixth level Warlock (or your total character level, whichever is lower.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Wizard
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a sixth level Wizard (or your total character level, whichever is lower.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Arcanum
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +25/+50/+100 spell points and +1/+2/+3 spell penetration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Greater Dragonmark of Storm
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Greater Dragonmark Spell: Call Lightning Storm

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Action Surge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Action Boosts also increase an ability score of your choice.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Action Surge: Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: While under the effect of any Action Boost, you gain a +1/+2/+3 Action Boost bonus to Strength.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Action Surge: Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: While under the effect of any Action Boost, you gain a +1/+2/+3 Action Boost bonus to Dexterity.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Action Surge: Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: While under the effect of any Action Boost, you gain a +1/+2/+3 Action Boost bonus to Constitution.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Action Surge: Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: While under the effect of any Action Boost, you gain a +1/+2/+3 Action Boost bonus to Intelligence.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Action Surge: Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: While under the effect of any Action Boost, you gain a +1/+2/+3 Action Boost bonus to Wisdom.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Action Surge: Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: While under the effect of any Action Boost, you gain a +1/+2/+3 Action Boost bonus to Charisma.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Dilettante Ability Score
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to an Ability based on your Dilettante feat.

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Arcane Archer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain access to the Arcane Archer enhancement tree. (The Elf: Arcane Archer tree uses your total character level instead of Ranger level, but advances Core Abilities at a slower rate. You cannot spend action points in both the Ranger: Arcane Archer and Elf: Arcane Archer trees.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Power of the Storm
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Greater Dragonmark activate: Your attacks gain Shocking, +25 Electrical Spell Power, and you gain 10 temporary spell points any time you take electrical damage from a spell. You also gain +2 bonus to Reflex save, but suffer a -2 penalty to Caster Levels of Earth spells and -2 to your Fortitude Saves. This effect lasts for 2 seconds per point of Concentration skill you have. (Cooldown: 1 minute)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Improved Recovery II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +20 Positive Healing Amplification.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Dilettante Special Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain abilities from your Dilettante Class Enhancements

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Damage Reduction II
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Barbarian damage reduction is increased by 1. +10 Hit Points. This enhancement cannot be taken if you possess the Resistance enhancement from Occult Slayer tree.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Recovery II
EnhancementSelection.Description: +10% Positive Energy Healing. This enhancement cannot be taken if you possess the Bastion of Purity enhancement from the Shintao Monk tree.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Spellcasting II
EnhancementSelection.Description: +5 Universal Spellpower

EnhancementSelection.Name: Lesser Courage
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain +4 to saving throws against fear and do not automatically fail saving throws against fear on a roll of a natural 1.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Master Tactics
EnhancementSelection.Description: +2 to the DC's of your Tactical abilities. This enhancement cannot be taken if you possess the Tactics enhancement from the Kensei tree.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Tanglefoot
EnhancementSelection.Description: Alchemical Trap Activate: Throws a cask of caustic liquid at your enemy, which explodes into a sticky mess. Enemies within the area of the goo puddle take 4d6 acid damage every 2 seconds and are slowed (Reflex DC 10 + Half Character Level + Intelligence Modifier Half). (Cooldown: 30 seconds.) This enhancement cannot be taken if you possess the Tanglefoot enhancement from the Mechanic tree.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Tempest
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain +10% chance to make off-hand attacks when dual wielding. This enhancement cannot be taken if you possess the Tempest enhancement from the Tempest tree.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Improved Dilettante III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Improves your Dilettante feat.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Artificer
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your knowledge of magical items has improved, and now extends to magical arms and armor. For item purposes you are now treated as a fourth level Artificer (or your total character level, whichever is lower.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Barbarian
EnhancementSelection.Description: You become more resilient and gain +5 hp.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Bard
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a tenth level Bard (or your total character level, whichever is lower.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Cleric
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a tenth level Cleric (or your total character level, whichever is lower.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Druid
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a tenth level Druid (or your total character level, whichever is lower.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Favored Soul
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a tenth level Favored Soul (or your total character level, whichever is lower.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Fighter
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your skill with arms is improved and you gain +1 weapon damage.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Monk
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your defensive skills have improved, and at level 4 or higher you are able to add up to 5 points of your Wisdom bonus to your armor class.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Paladin
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Lesser Divine Grace has improved and at level 4 or higher you may add up to 5 points of your charisma bonus to your saves. For item use purposes you are now treated as a fourth level Paladin (or your total character level, whichever is lower)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Ranger
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Lesser Bow Strength has improved and at level 4 or higher are able to add up to 8 points of your strength bonus to attacks with bows. For item use purposes you are now treated as a fourth level Ranger (or your total character level, whichever is lower)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Rogue
EnhancementSelection.Description: You practice stealthy attacks and gain +1d6 Sneak Attack

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Sorcerer
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a tenth level Sorcerer (or your total character level, whichever is lower.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Warlock
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a tenth level Warlock (or your total character level, whichever is lower.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Wizard
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a tenth level Wizard (or your total character level, whichever is lower.)
